docblock.long-description: Contract to which all database drivers should conform
Connect to the database
Kill the connection to the database
Prepare a query statement
Bind the value of a referenced variable to a placeholder in the prepared query
Execute a prepared query
Begin a transaction
Commit all executions made in the current transaction
Rollback all executions made in the current transaction

Return an associative array of the next row in the result set

[
    $column1 => $value1,
    $column2 => $value2
]
Return a stdClass object of the next row in the result set

Return a multi-deminesional array of all rows from the result set

[
    0 => [
        $column1 => $value1,
        $column2 => $value2
    ],
    1 => [
        $column1 => $value1,
        $column2 => $value2
    ]
]

A database abstraction for PHP OCI8 functionality.

Note: It is recommended, for performance improvements, to set the oci8.default_prefetch option in your php.ini. This will significantly improve network performance as it will reduce the number of round trips on the network by buffering rows into the SLQ*Net transport cache.
Checks if executions should be auto commited
A database abstraction for PHP PDO driver
Object to handle calls to database driver objects, provides an interface to write ANSI/ISO SQL without object oriented query building with support for transactions.
A Dependency Injection Container.
Provide configuration for the container instance
Register a class name, closure or fully configured item with the container, we will handle dependencies at the time it is requested
Check if an alias is registered with the container
Resolve and return the requested item
Builds an object and injects constructor arguments

Recursively resolve dependencies, and dependencies of dependencies etc.. etc.. Will first check if the parameters type hint is instantiable and resolve that, if not it will attempt to resolve an implementation from the param annotation
Accepts an object in string or object form and returns an array of param matches from the constructor doc block
Proxy to resolve method
Proxy to register method
Destroys an item in the container
Proxy to registered method
A contract to provide an implementation of a container
Register an item with the container
Resolve an item from the container

A definition of an item registered with the dependency injection container. Holds information regarding constructor injection and any method calls to be invoked before returning an instance of the item

docblock.description: The fully qualified namespace of the instance to return
Array of constructor arguments to be injected
Array of methods to call before returning the object
Does the object need to be auto resolved?

docblock.long-description: Configure and returns the object associated with this definition
Instantiates the object with any constructor arguments injected
Invokes all methods that are associated with the definition
Checks if the definition has a class associated with it
Sets a constructor argument for the definition
Proxy to withArgument method, accepts an array of arguments
Checks if the definition has registered constructor arguments to inject
Sets a method call for the definition
Proxy to withMethodCall method, accepts array of method calls with method arguments
Checks if this definition has any registered methods to invoke
An autoloader object allowing a project to adhere to PSR-0

docblock.description: Array of registered namespace => path pairs
Array of registered prefix => path pairs

docblock.long-description: Register a namespace => path pair with the autoloader
Register a prefix => path pair with the autoloader
Register a direct path to a class with the autoloader
Returns the namespace registry array
Returns the prefix registry array
Returns the class registry array
Resolves a class file from a provided class
Converts a class name to a filename
Checks to see if a class is already loaded
Autoload method to be registered with the spl autoload stack
Registers this autoloader with the spl autoload stack
Unregisters this autoloader from the spl autoload stack
